system.description:
Witch

Destiny Playbook

When you can conjure hammers at will, every problem starts looking like an eldritch nail.

Requirements

To become the Witch, you must have solved at least three problems using Magic when they could have been solved otherwise.

The Witch starts with a Witch Custom Move of their choice.

Advancement

When you Level Up, choose one Advancement from either this list or from your Basic Playbook, then mark it. You may only choose each option once.

  • Increase one of your stats by +1, to a maximum of +3.
  • Take a Witch Custom.
  • Take a Witch Custom.
  • Take a Witch Custom.
  • Take a Witch Custom.

Custom Moves
